assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: AALJ received an independent research grant from BioMarin and consulting fees from Novo Nordisk. The other authors declare that they have no competing financial interests to declare.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Comite de Etica e Pesquisa do Hospital das Clínicas da Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de Sao Paulo (CAAE, 06425812.4.0000.0068) provided approval for this study. Written informed consent for genetics studies and publication of individual details and images was obtained.
